data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Baja Verapaz.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baja Verapaz, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Baja Verapaz, Guatemala will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Baja Verapaz, Guatemala.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Baja Verapaz to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Baja Verapaz to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Over 4.7 percent of the people of Baja Verapaz are far from Jesus.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Baja Verapaz that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
